EmailTemplate.name: CH 3monthExpiry Transaction
EmailTemplate.subject: Request to close about to expire for {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}({!Transaction__c.CompanyNumber__c}) Ref: FE{!Transaction__c.Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Companies House Three Month Expiry
Request to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}
Your request to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}({!Transaction__c.CompanyNumber__c}) whose registered office address is {!Transaction__c.CompanyAddress1__c} {!Transaction__c.CompanyPostCode__c} has not been completed and will be deleted on {!Today()+30}. Your reference number for any future enquiries is FE{!Transaction__c.Id}.
View the directors signing status
What happens next:
To avoid the request being deleted, it's important that you ask those who have not approved to approve this request before {!Today()+30}.
Contact Centre tel +44 (0)303 1234 500 or email enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk.
This email was sent from a notification-only email address which cannot accept incoming mail. Please do not reply directly to this message.
